verses.verse: These are the journeys<WH4550> of the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>, which went forth<WH3318> out of the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714> with their armies<WH6635> under the hand<WH3027> of Moses<WH4872> and Aaron<WH175>.

And Moses<WH4872> wrote<WH3789> their goings out<WH4161> according to their journeys<WH4550> by the commandment<WH6310> of the LORD<WH3068>: and these are their journeys<WH4550> according to their goings out<WH4161>.

And they departed<WH5265> from Rameses<WH7486> in the first<WH7223> month<WH2320>, on the fifteenth<WH6240> <WH2568> day<WH3117> of the first<WH7223> month<WH2320>; on the morrow<WH4283> after the passover<WH6453> the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> went out<WH3318> with an high<WH7311> hand<WH3027> in the sight<WH5869> of all the Egyptians<WH4714>.

For the Egyptians<WH4714> buried<WH6912> all their firstborn<WH1060>, which the LORD<WH3068> had smitten<WH5221> among them: upon their gods<WH430> also the LORD<WH3068> executed<WH6213> judgments<WH8201>.
And the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> removed<WH5265> from Rameses<WH7486>, and pitched<WH2583> in Succoth<WH5523>.
And they departed<WH5265> from Succoth<WH5523>, and pitched<WH2583> in Etham<WH864>, which is in the edge<WH7097> of the wilderness<WH4057>.
And they removed<WH5265> from Etham<WH864>, and turned again<WH7725> unto Pihahiroth<WH6367>, which is before Baalzephon<WH1189>: and they pitched<WH2583> before<WH6440> Migdol<WH4024>.

And they departed<WH5265> from before<WH6440> Pihahiroth<WH6367>, and passed through<WH5674> the midst<WH8432> of the sea<WH3220> into the wilderness<WH4057>, and went<WH3212> three<WH7969> days'<WH3117> journey<WH1870> in the wilderness<WH4057> of Etham<WH864>, and pitched<WH2583> in Marah<WH4785>.

And they removed<WH5265> from Marah<WH4785>, and came<WH935> unto Elim<WH362>: and in Elim<WH362> were twelve<WH8147> <WH6240> fountains<WH5869> of water<WH4325>, and threescore and ten<WH7657> palm trees<WH8558>; and they pitched<WH2583> there.
And they removed<WH5265> from Elim<WH362>, and encamped<WH2583> by the Red<WH5488> sea<WH3220>.
And they removed<WH5265> from the Red<WH5488> sea<WH3220>, and encamped<WH2583> in the wilderness<WH4057> of Sin<WH5512>.
And they took their journey<WH5265> out of the wilderness<WH4057> of Sin<WH5512>, and encamped<WH2583> in Dophkah<WH1850>.
And they departed<WH5265> from Dophkah<WH1850>, and encamped<WH2583> in Alush<WH442>.
And they removed<WH5265> from Alush<WH442>, and encamped<WH2583> at Rephidim<WH7508>, where was no water<WH4325> for the people<WH5971> to drink<WH8354>.
And they departed<WH5265> from Rephidim<WH7508>, and pitched<WH2583> in the wilderness<WH4057> of Sinai<WH5514>.
And they removed<WH5265> from the desert<WH4057> of Sinai<WH5514>, and pitched<WH2583> at Kibrothhattaavah<WH6914>. Kibrothhattaavah: that is, the graves of lust
And they departed<WH5265> from Kibrothhattaavah<WH6914>, and encamped<WH2583> at Hazeroth<WH2698>.
And they departed<WH5265> from Hazeroth<WH2698>, and pitched<WH2583> in Rithmah<WH7575>.
And they departed<WH5265> from Rithmah<WH7575>, and pitched<WH2583> at Rimmonparez<WH7428>.
And they departed<WH5265> from Rimmonparez<WH7428>, and pitched<WH2583> in Libnah<WH3841>.
And they removed<WH5265> from Libnah<WH3841>, and pitched<WH2583> at Rissah<WH7446>.
And they journeyed<WH5265> from Rissah<WH7446>, and pitched<WH2583> in Kehelathah<WH6954>.
And they went<WH5265> from Kehelathah<WH6954>, and pitched<WH2583> in mount<WH2022> Shapher<WH8234>.
And they removed<WH5265> from mount<WH2022> Shapher<WH8234>, and encamped<WH2583> in Haradah<WH2732>.
And they removed<WH5265> from Haradah<WH2732>, and pitched<WH2583> in Makheloth<WH4722>.
And they removed<WH5265> from Makheloth<WH4722>, and encamped<WH2583> at Tahath<WH8480>.
And they departed<WH5265> from Tahath<WH8480>, and pitched<WH2583> at Tarah<WH8646>.
And they removed<WH5265> from Tarah<WH8646>, and pitched<WH2583> in Mithcah<WH4989>.
And they went<WH5265> from Mithcah<WH4989>, and pitched<WH2583> in Hashmonah<WH2832>.
And they departed<WH5265> from Hashmonah<WH2832>, and encamped<WH2583> at Moseroth<WH4149>.
And they departed<WH5265> from Moseroth<WH4149>, and pitched<WH2583> in Benejaakan<WH1142>.
And they removed<WH5265> from Benejaakan<WH1142>, and encamped<WH2583> at Horhagidgad<WH2735>.
And they went<WH5265> from Horhagidgad<WH2735>, and pitched<WH2583> in Jotbathah<WH3193>.
And they removed<WH5265> from Jotbathah<WH3193>, and encamped<WH2583> at Ebronah<WH5684>.
And they departed<WH5265> from Ebronah<WH5684>, and encamped<WH2583> at Eziongaber<WH6100>.
And they removed<WH5265> from Eziongaber<WH6100>, and pitched<WH2583> in the wilderness<WH4057> of Zin<WH6790>, which is Kadesh<WH6946>.
And they removed<WH5265> from Kadesh<WH6946>, and pitched<WH2583> in mount<WH2022> Hor<WH2023>, in the edge<WH7097> of the land<WH776> of Edom<WH123>.

And Aaron<WH175> the priest<WH3548> went up<WH5927> into mount<WH2022> Hor<WH2023> at the commandment<WH6310> of the LORD<WH3068>, and died<WH4191> there, in the fortieth<WH705> year<WH8141> after the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> were come out<WH3318> of the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714>, in the first<WH259> day of the fifth<WH2549> month<WH2320>.
And Aaron<WH175> was an hundred<WH3967> and twenty<WH6242> and three<WH7969> years<WH8141> old<WH1121> when he died<WH4194> in mount<WH2022> Hor<WH2023>.

And king<WH4428> Arad<WH6166> the Canaanite<WH3669>, which dwelt<WH3427> in the south<WH5045> in the land<WH776> of Canaan<WH3667>, heard<WH8085> of the coming<WH935> of the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>.
And they departed<WH5265> from mount<WH2022> Hor<WH2023>, and pitched<WH2583> in Zalmonah<WH6758>.
And they departed<WH5265> from Zalmonah<WH6758>, and pitched<WH2583> in Punon<WH6325>.
And they departed<WH5265> from Punon<WH6325>, and pitched<WH2583> in Oboth<WH88>.
And they departed<WH5265> from Oboth<WH88>, and pitched<WH2583> in Ijeabarim<WH5863>, in the border<WH1366> of Moab<WH4124>. Ijeabarim: or, heaps of Abarim
And they departed<WH5265> from Iim<WH5864>, and pitched<WH2583> in Dibongad<WH1769>.
And they removed<WH5265> from Dibongad<WH1769>, and encamped<WH2583> in Almondiblathaim<WH5963>.
And they removed<WH5265> from Almondiblathaim<WH5963>, and pitched<WH2583> in the mountains<WH2022> of Abarim<WH5682>, before<WH6440> Nebo<WH5015>.
And they departed<WH5265> from the mountains<WH2022> of Abarim<WH5682>, and pitched<WH2583> in the plains<WH6160> of Moab<WH4124> by Jordan<WH3383> near Jericho<WH3405>.
And they pitched<WH2583> by Jordan<WH3383>, from Bethjesimoth<WH1020> even unto Abelshittim<WH63> in the plains<WH6160> of Moab<WH4124>. Abelshittim: or, the plains of Shittim
And the LORD<WH3068> spake<WH1696> unto Moses<WH4872> in the plains<WH6160> of Moab<WH4124> by Jordan<WH3383> near Jericho<WH3405>, saying<WH559>,
Speak<WH1696> unto the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>, and say<WH559> unto them, When ye are passed over<WH5674> Jordan<WH3383> into the land<WH776> of Canaan<WH3667>;

Then ye shall drive out<WH3423> all the inhabitants<WH3427> of the land<WH776> from before<WH6440> you, and destroy<WH6> all their pictures<WH4906>, and destroy<WH6> all their molten<WH4541> images<WH6754>, and quite pluck down<WH8045> all their high places<WH1116>:
And ye shall dispossess<WH3423> the inhabitants of the land<WH776>, and dwell<WH3427> therein: for I have given<WH5414> you the land<WH776> to possess<WH3423> it.

And ye shall divide<WH5157> the land<WH776> by lot<WH1486> for an inheritance<WH5157> among your families<WH4940>: and to the more<WH7227> ye shall give the more<WH7235> inheritance<WH5159>, and to the fewer<WH4592> ye shall give the less<WH4591> inheritance<WH5159>: every man's inheritance shall be in the place where his lot<WH1486> falleth<WH3318>; according to the tribes<WH4294> of your fathers<WH1> ye shall inherit<WH5157>. give the more: Heb. multiply his inheritance give the less: Heb. diminish his inheritance

But if ye will not drive out<WH3423> the inhabitants<WH3427> of the land<WH776> from before<WH6440> you; then it shall come to pass, that those which ye let remain<WH3498> of them shall be pricks<WH7899> in your eyes<WH5869>, and thorns<WH6796> in your sides<WH6654>, and shall vex<WH6887> you in the land<WH776> wherein ye dwell<WH3427>.
Moreover it shall come to pass, that I shall do<WH6213> unto you, as I thought<WH1819> to do<WH6213> unto them.
